## 

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library("tidyverse")
library("readr")
```

```{r}
# Loading the clean data tsv file 
analysis_data <- read_tsv(here('data/03_dat_aug.tsv'))
```

```{r}
analysis_data |>
  select(Administration_type, Count_API, Count_Side_Effects) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(Application_type), 
             y = Count_Side_Effects, 
             fill = as.factor(Administration_type))) +  
  geom_point(size = 3) 
```
